sql.query:
SELECT COUNT(m_product.id) AS CountId
FROM m_product
LEFT JOIN m_restaurant AS mr ON (mr.id = m_product.rest_id)
WHERE m_product.market_id = :P1 /* {{$_GET.market}} */ AND m_product.status = :P2 /* {{1}} */ AND mr.status = :P3 /* {{1}} */ AND (m_product.prod_occurance_id = :P4 /* {{2}} */ OR m_product.prod_occurance_id = :P5 /* {{4}} */)

SELECT mp.id as p_id, mp.prod_id, mp.rest_id, mp.prod_mark_id, mp.prod_name_en as prod_name, mp.prod_desc_en as prod_description, mp.prod_img1, 
mr.shop_name_en as shop_name,  (select array_to_json(array_agg(row_to_json(q))) from (select rpt.id as price_id, rpt.quantity, rpt.q_unit, rpt.mrp, 
rpt.selling_price as price, rpt.product_tax from r_price_table rpt where rpt.prod_id=mp.id) q) as price, 
coalesce((select rw.prod_id where rw.prod_id is not null),0) as count_wl,
coalesce((select rc.prod_id where rc.prod_id is not null),0) as count_cart, 
coalesce((select avg(rpr.review_value) from r_prod_review rpr where rpr.prod_id = mp.id and rpr.review_value is not null),0) as avg_review
FROM m_product mp 
left join m_restaurant mr on (mr.id=mp.rest_id) 
left join r_wishlist rw on (mp.id=rw.prod_id and rw.user_id=@user_id) 
left join r_cart rc on (mp.id=rc.prod_id and rc.user_id=@user_id) 
WHERE mp.status=1 AND (mp.prod_occurance_id=2 OR mp.prod_occurance_id=4) AND mp.market_id=@market AND mp.deleted_on is null AND mr.deleted_on is null ORDER by mp.id DESC limit @limit;
